channel.title: Home page change/developer category
channel.description:
Ok, you'll see a couple of small changes.... any thoughts or views, like / dislike?
- developer category, for programmers to discussion development issues related to the implementation of axoloti.. its not for feature requests or anything similar.
- home page, is not 'categories' , so it looks more like a traditional forum, if you want the old view just click on 'latest'.. you could bookmark that it you want it as your default.
- category ordering, moved to a fixed order which I think is relevant to most users, let me know if you think there is a better order.

item.title: Home page change/developer category
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Ok, you'll see a couple of small changes....
any thoughts or views, like / dislike?

  • developer category, for programmers to discussion development issues related to the implementation of axoloti.. its not for feature requests or anything similar.

  • home page, is not 'categories' , so it looks more like a traditional forum, if you want the old view just click on 'latest'.. you could bookmark that it you want it as your default.

  • category ordering, moved to a fixed order which I think is relevant to most users, let me know if you think there is a better order.
